author: Fearless & Far
description:
Want to do your own 4x4 Trip of Mongolia? Check out https://themongoliatour.com/. Love the winter? Do this trip at this link https://themongoliatour.com/tours/mongolia-winter-offroad-tour/

We drove over 3,000km across the wild heart of Mongolia in a rugged 4x4 mission to reach the remote Tsaatan reindeer herders of the north. Along the way, we lived with nomadic families, crossed vast steppes, deep river valleys, and endless mountain passes. This wasn’t just a journey—it was a raw, immersive experience into one of the last surviving nomadic cultures on Earth.

In the final stretch, deep in the taiga, we were invited to witness and take part in a rare Tsaatan rite of passage—an honor few outsiders have ever experienced. This is the story of endurance, culture, and connection in one of the most untouched corners of the planet.
Big love to LIQUI MOLY Extreme for hosting us. You can do this trip too. Check the link above!

Join our Expeditions & Adventure Retreats
www.fearlessandfar.com/
title: I Survived a BRUTAL Mongolian Rite of Passage
